entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-07
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Nuget package file path casing incorrect on Linux #33089
  • "CreateAppHost" task failed unexpectedly (MacOS) - Could not set file permission 493 #27436
  • There was no runtime pack for Microsoft.AspNetCore.App available for the Specified RuntimeIdentifier'browser-wasm' #27238
    Discussion
  • tmp file copy failed the Aot Test #30456
  • EnablePackageValidation reports CP1003 when multitargeting windows lib #28746
    8.0.1xx

Updated

  • Downlevel wasm tests fail on net6.0.x runtime pack download #32864
    8.0.1xx
  • failed to find runtime pack #32205
  • [API Compat] add rule to make sure that parameter default value don't change #30249
    Backlog
  • met a issue when using Add multiple C# projects to a solution #31615
    Backlog
  • MSBuild property ArtifactsPath is overloaded; used by both .Net 8 and Microsoft.Build.Artifacts #33052
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Watch.BrowserRefresh causes Microsoft.NETCore.App.Ref 6.0 prebuilts #30272
  • [8.0.100-preview.5.23276.4]Unable to cast object of type when passing data(custom type) to a component in Blazor Apps after building #32967
  • dotnet tools are not able to work with process which is running under tmux #33044
  • Version number is missing from dotnet publish output in linux docker images #12913
  • Net 7 sdk build freezes computer #27697
  • [Megathread] Infrastructure Issues #28442
  • [API Compat] unify error message style across rules #25564
    Backlog
  • [NETE2ESDK][Loc]With VS 17.7 preview 2 + net 8 preview 5, warning NETSDK1201 message is unlocalized when publishing net 7.0 project. #32595

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #33088
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #33087
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Standardize error messages #33084
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Add PackageReference to new Roslyn package (#29787) #32734
    Area-Compilers, Servicing-approved, 7.0.8
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #33067
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve warning message for ILLink runtime pack #33041
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #32975
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.3xx] added `Microsoft.DotNet.Cli.Utils.dll` to package content #32375
    Servicing-approved, Area-Containers, 7.0.8
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #32730
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.14.1 to 20.0.0 in /eng/dependabot #32713
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: 7.0.3xx
  • PackageValidation compare TargetFrameworkInformation instead of TargetFramework property directly #33036
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • Update branding to 6.0.119 #33054
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.314 #33055
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.305 #33059
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.108 #33057
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.411 #33056
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Startup race condition #33007
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • add GarbageCollectionAdaptationMode msbuild property #33043
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • ProcessFrameworkReferences if tool packs are required #33062
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Add zsh compdef completion script. #14239
  • Don't run helix tests if the build fails #33045
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [WIP] Add support for starting the application through CMD (instead of ENTRYPOINT). #33037
    untriaged
  • Add dependencies needed for source-build PVP flow #33039
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Validate existing suppressions and remove unnecessary suppressions when re-generating suppression files #32964
    Area-ApiCompat
  • [Containers] Fix registry operations that use chunks and various resiliency enhancements #33019
    Area-Containers
  • Containers: add support for using 'podman' without a system 'docker' alias. #32783
    untriaged
  • Remove DynamicCodeSupport default from SDK #33040
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
